column5: I think it's time to have some t-shirts made up!!
You really like talking about the Leafs eh? Don't worry. Your secret infatuation is safe with me.
The funny part about the photo is all the emotion those people have caught up in an entertaining tv show they had nothing to do with.
Lol next year the same photo will be taken of the Sens in front of Canadian Tire...lol
Imposible. The only time there are 4 sens fans in one place is at the friends and family end of season party.
